方法详细信息

startup

protected void startup()
At startup create and show the main frame of the application.

指定者：
类 org.jdesktop.application.Application 中的 startup

configureWindow

protected void configureWindow(java.awt.Window root)
This method is to initialize the specified window by injecting resources. Windows shown in our application come fully initialized from the GUI builder, so this additional configuration is not needed.

覆盖：
类 org.jdesktop.application.SingleFrameApplication 中的 configureWindow

getApplication

public static ManoMachineApp getApplication()
A convenient static getter for the application instance.

返回：
the instance of ManoMachineApp

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Main method launching the application.
